"“I am convinced that at least half of what separates successful entrepreneurs from unsuccessful ones is sheer perseverance” - Steve Jobs"
"“Wealth, after all, is a relative thing, since he who has little and wants less is richer than he who has more and wants even more.” - Charles Caleb Colton"
"“You can't save people, you can just love them”: Anaïs Nin"
"“The way to hit the nail once is to hit the horseshoe a hundred times”: Colonel Sanders"
"“He who loses money, loses a lot; the one who loses a friend; lose even more; he who loses faith loses everything”: Eleanor Roosevelt"
"“Keep a global vision while attending to the daily details”: Donald Trump
"“Do what you can, with what you have, where you are”: Theodore Roosevelt"
"“No matter how many times you fail, you only have to be right once. Then everyone will call you an overnight success and tell you how lucky you are” – Mark Cuban"
"“Never go the way you have set out, because it leads where others have already been” - Alexander Graham Bell"
"“If you don't like to take risks, you should run out of business”: Ray Kroc"
"“Success is 1%% inspiration and 99%% perspiration” - Thomas Edison"
"“Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work and the only way to do it is to love what you do.”: Anonymous"
"“Always keep your eyes open, Always watching. Because anything you see can inspire you”: Grace Coddington"
"“If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. As with everything that has to do with the heart, you will know when you have found it” - Steve Jobs"
"“Opportunities don't happen, they are created”: Chris Grosser"
"“Only buy something you are happy with if the market closes in 10 years” – Warren Buffett
"“You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by avoiding it today” - Abraham Lincoln
"“Money doesn't make you happy, but it calms your nerves”: Sean O'Casey"
"“I really am a practical dreamer; my dreams are not trifles in the air. What I want is to make my dreams come true”: Mahatma Gandi
"“There are many bad reasons to start a business. But there's only one good reason, and I think you know what it is: to change the world.” Phil Libin"
"“Always give more than what is expected of you”: Larry Page
"“Move fast and break objects. If you're not breaking things, you're not moving fast enough.” - Mark Zuckerberg"
"“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams”: Eleanor Roosevelt
"“Take your first step with faith, you don't have to see the whole ladder, just take your first step” - Martin Luther King"
"“Money is often very expensive”: Ralph Waldo Emerson"
"“An optimist sees an opportunity in every calamity, a pessimist sees a calamity in every opportunity” – Winston Churchill"
"“Our greatest glory does not consist in never having fallen, but in having risen after each fall”: Confucius"
"“The most important thing to do if you're in a hole is to stop digging” - Warren Buffett"

"“I hate how people think 'glass half empty' when in reality their glass is almost full. I am grateful when I have one more drop in the glass because I know exactly what to do with it” – Gary Vaynerchuk"
"“It is hard to fail, but it is even worse never to have tried to succeed.” - Theodore Roosevelt"
"“People can be very smart or have skills that are applicable, but if they don't believe in it, then they're not going to work really hard” - Mark Zuckerberg"
"“Our greatest weakness is to give up, the only way to succeed is to always try one more time” - Thomas Edison"
"“I've found that the harder I work, the luckier I get” - Thomas Jefferson"
"“Buy when everyone else is selling and save money when everyone else is buying. It is not a slogan. It is the essence of successful investments”: J. Paul Getty
"“There is no substitute for hard work” – Thomas Edison
"“Most people miss out on opportunities because they dress normal and look like work” – Thomas Edison
"“I think it's easier to move forward on mega-ambitious dreams”: Larry Page"
"“There is a rule for the businessman and it is: make products with the highest possible quality at the lowest cost and paying the highest possible wages”: Henry Ford"
"“Sharing ideas without processing them can lead us into the delusion of thinking that we are actually doing something, when in fact we are not doing anything”: Charles T. Lee"
"“The habit of saving is an education; encourages every virtue, teaches self-control, cultivates a sense of order, trains foresight, and broadens the mind”: TT Munger"
"“Don't waste your time banging on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door”: Coco Chanel"
"“How you deal with failure determines how you achieve success” – David Feherty
"“Experience taught me that the best investments are the ones you don't make”: Donald Trump"
"“Watch, listen and learn. You can't know everything. Anyone who thinks they know everything is destined for mediocrity”: Donald Trump"
"“Try the impossible to improve your work”: Brian Tracy"
"“If you can dream it you can do it, remember that all this began with a mouse”: Walt Disney"
"“There are only two ways to live your life. One is to think that nothing is a miracle. The other is to think that everything is a miracle ”: Albert Einstein"
"“If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try”: Seth Godin"
"“I definitely wanted to earn my freedom. But the main motivation was not to make money, but to make an impact”: Sean Parker"
"“Lack of money is the root of all evil” - Mark Twain"
"“You can only live once. And I don't want to waste a minute of my life.” - Richard Branson"
"“Man discovers himself when he measures himself against an obstacle”: Antoine de Saint Exupery
"“Failure is only the opportunity to start over more intelligently” - Henry Ford"
"“A business absolutely dedicated to service will have only one concern about profits: they will be too great” - Henry Ford"
"“Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace it if the alternative is disaster”: Elon Musk"
"“Do what you love and the money will follow”: Marsha Sinetar
"“To succeed, we must first believe that we can”: Nikos Kazantzakis"
"“Success is a lousy teacher. Seduce smart people into thinking they can't lose.” - Bill Gates"
"“If you fall seven times, get up eight”: Nana Koribi Yaoki"
"“When you have money, only you remember who you are. But when you don't have money, everyone forgets who you are. Such is life” – Bill Gates"
"“The best way to predict the future is to invent it” - Alan Key"
"“Whether you think you can, or you think you can't, you're right” - Henry Ford"
"“Success is connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they never give up” – Conrad Hilton
"“If we had to talk more than listen, we would have two mouths and only one ear” - Mark Twain"
"“The biggest risk is not taking any. In a world that is changing so fast, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.” – Mark Zuckerberg"
"“To do or not to do. There is no use trying, only doing”: Yoda"
"“Money can't buy friends, but you can buy a new kind of enemy”: Spike Milligan"
"“You will be successful because most people are lazy”: Shahir Zag"
"“Do something that scares you every day”: Anonymous"
"“Don't try to be original, just try to be good”: Paul Rand"
"“You are a successful person when you have some of the things money can buy and all the things money can't buy” - Zig Ziglar"
"“There are only two days in the year when nothing can be done. One is called yesterday and the other one tomorrow. Therefore, today is the ideal day to love, grow, do, and mainly live”: Dalai Laima"
"“Fear exists nowhere else except in the mind” – Dale Carnegie
"“A coward is incapable of showing love; doing so is reserved for the brave” – Mahatma Gandi

"“There are men that fight one day and are good. There are others that fight for a year and are better. Some fight for many years and are very good. But there are those who struggle all their lives. Those are the essentials”: Bertolt Brecht"
"“Money can't buy life”: Bob Marley"
"“Money is a tool. It will take you where you want, but it will not replace you as a driver”: Ayn Rand"
"“Time, perseverance, and ten years of trying will eventually make you look like an overnight success.” - Biz Stone"
"“Optimism is the quality most associated with success and happiness” – Brian Tracy
"“It took me 20 years to be successful overnight”: Woody Allen"
"“Risking more than others think is safe. Dreaming more than others think is practical” – Howard Schultz
"“Making money in itself is not difficult. The difficult thing is to earn it by doing something worth dedicating your life to”: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
"“Don't worry about financing if you don't need it. Today it is cheaper than ever to start a business”: Noah Everett
"“In the ideas is where our strength lies and all the better if we hold them with obstinacy”: Enzo Ferrari

"“Keep in mind that your purpose and your plan to achieve it can be modified from time to time… the important thing is that you understand the meaning of always working with an objective in mind and with a well-structured plan”: Napoleon Hill
"“If you double the number of experiments you do per year, you will double your ingenuity”: Jeff Bezos"
"“Stop chasing money and start chasing passion”: Tony Hsieh"
"“Wealth does not consist in having great possessions, but in having few needs”: Epithet"
"“Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn” - John Maxwell"
"“You are only as good as the people you hire”: Ray Kroc
"“If you double the number of experiments you do per year, you will double your ingenuity”: Jeff Bezos"
"“Stop chasing money and start chasing passion”: Tony Hsieh"
"“Wealth does not consist in having great possessions, but in having few needs”: Epithet"
"“Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn” - John Maxwell"
"“You are only as good as the people you hire”: Ray Kroc
"“Intelligence is a gift, kindness is a choice”: Jeff Bezos"
"“Simplicity and common sense should be the basis of strategic planning and direction”: Ingvar Kamprad
"“Success is learning to go from failure to failure without despairing” - Winston Churchill"
"“Price is what you pay, value is what you get” - Warren Buffett"
"“Never spend your money before you have it”: Thomas Jefferson"
"“I owe my success to listening respectfully to the best advice, and then disappearing and doing the exact opposite”: GK Chesterton"
"“A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business” - Henry Ford"
"“When you innovate, you have to be prepared for people to tell you that you are crazy”: Larry Ellison"
"“Those who say something cannot be done are often interrupted by others who are doing it”: Joel A. Barker
"“Those who quit are more numerous than those who fail” - Henry Ford"
"“While money cannot buy happiness, it allows you to choose your own form of misery” - Groucho Marx"

"“Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through the trial-and-error experience of suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition be inspired, and success ultimately achieved”: Helen Keller"
"“Life is dangerous, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who sit and watch what happens” - Albert Einstein"
"“People are not remembered by the number of times they fail, but by the number of times they succeed” - Thomas Alva Edison"
"“Each person forges their own destiny”: Carlos Slim
"“You can say anything to people, but the way you say it determines how they react” – John Rampton"
"“I think it's possible for normal people to choose to be extraordinary”: Elon Musk"
"“Success is how high you bounce after you hit rock bottom” – George Patton
"“Competition makes you better, always, always makes you better, even if the competitor wins”: Carlos Slim"
"“Numbing the pain for a while will make you feel it more intensely later.” - Albus Dumbledore"
"“All progress takes place outside the comfort zone” – Michael John Bobak
"“It is better to do the most insignificant thing in the world, than spend half an hour doing nothing” - Goethe"
"“Never lower your head, always look up, win or lose”: Enzo Ferrari"
"“He who thinks he knows everything is closing doors”: Donald Trump"
"“I have not failed. I have found 10,000 ways that don't work.” - Thomas Edison"
"“Outstanding leaders go out of their way to build self-esteem in their staff. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can achieve.” - Sam Walton"
"“If you can't fly, run, if you can't run, walk, if you can't walk, crawl. No matter what you do, keep moving forward” – Martin Luther King Jr."
"“Rule number 1: never lose money. Rule number 2: never forget rule number 1” – Warren Buffett
"“It is not the man who has little, but the one who wants more who is poor”: Seneca"
"“What really shapes our lives is the meaning we give to things” - Tony Robbins"
"“Persistence is very important. You should not resign unless you are forced to resign” – Elon Musk
"“Friends and good manners will take you where money can't” - Margaret Walker"
"“If you only work on things that you like and are passionate about, you shouldn't have a master plan to see how everything turns out”: Mark Zuckerberg"
"“Don't think that money does everything or you will end up doing everything for money”: Voltaire"
"“When a dream appears, grab it!”: Larry Page"
"“Failure is a great opportunity to start again more intelligently” - Henry Ford"
"“To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of garbage” – Thomas Edison"
"“Money and success don't change people; they simply amplify what is already there” – Will Smith
"“There is only one class in the community that thinks more about money than the rich, and that is the poor”: Oscar Wilde"

"“Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than the ones you did do. So cast off your moorings, sail away from safe harbors, catch the favorable winds in your sails. Explore. Dream”: Mark Twain"
"“Nothing is particularly difficult if you break it down into small jobs”: Henry Ford Quotes"
"“A little effort is the best substitute for excuses”: Donald Trump"
"“You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore”: Christopher Columbus
"“Formal education will give you a living; self-education will make you a fortune” – Jim Rohn
"“It takes 20 years to create a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think that way, you will do things differently.” – Warren Buffet"
"“Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant”: PT Barnum"
"“Somebody sits today in the shade of a tree they planted long ago” – Warren Buffett
"“Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The surest way to succeed is always to try one more time.” - Thomas Edison"
"“Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a jaguar than on a bus”: Françoise Sagan"
"“Celebrate your success. Find some humor in your failures” – Sam Walton
"“A person should set his goals as soon as possible and devote all his energy and talent to them”: Walt Disney
"“Don't let the fear of losing outweigh the thrill of winning”: Robert Kiyosaki"
"“Money can't buy happiness, but it sure will buy you a better kind of memory” – Ronald Reagan"
"“Money doesn't buy happiness, but it relieves stress”: Besa Kosova"
"“Choose a job you like, and you will never have to work a single day in your life.” - Confucius"
"“I never try to make money in the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the next day and reopen in 10 years.” – Warren Buffett
"“Only those who are asleep do not make mistakes”: Ingvar Kamprad"
"“Not everything that can be counted counts and not everything that counts can be counted” - Albert Einstein"
"“The obstinate will to pursue one's own ambition is truly a force that can overcome obstacles”: Enzo Ferrari
"“I have never dreamed of success. I have always worked to achieve it”: Estée Lauder

"“Time is your most important resource. You can do so much in ten minutes. Ten minutes, once past, are gone forever. Ten minutes is not just one sixth of an hour. Divide your life into units of ten minutes and waste as few as possible on meaningless activities”: Ingvar Kamprad"
"“If you really want to do something, you find a way. If not, you will find an excuse”: Jim Rohn"
"“You don't need to have a company of 100 people to develop that idea”: Larry Page
"“Whenever they ask you if you can do a job, answer yes and immediately start learning how to do it”: Franklin D. Roosevelt"
"“We decided to go ahead, despite the risks and going against reason, because we believe that the path that others have chosen is the right one and the best thing to do”: Howard Schultz"
"“My biggest motivation? Keep challenging myself. I see life as a long university education that I never had – every day I am learning something new”: Richard Branson
"“We fall to succeed”: Mary Kay Ash
"“No man should receive a dollar unless that dollar is justly earned.” - Theodore Roosevelt"

"“The Internet should be a means of communication between peoples that contributes to world peace and that the main objective of high technology is to improve people's standard of living”: Larry Ellison"
"“Do not try to become a man of success but a man of values”: Albert Einstein"
"“The first step is to establish that something is possible; then the probability will happen”: Elon Musk
"“You can be young without money, but you can't be old without it”: Tennessee Williams"
"“Too many people spend the money they earned to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like” - Will Rogers"
"“There is a difference between being poor and being broke. One can be temporarily broke, one is poor for life”: Robert Kiyosaki"

"“When you are 80 years old, and in a quiet moment of reflection, narrating only for yourself the most personal version of your life story, the story that will be most concise and meaningful will be the series of choices you have made. In the end, we are our choices” – Jeff Bezos"
"“Never give up on a dream for as long as it may take. In the same way, time will pass ”: Earl Nightingale"
"“In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable” – Robert Arnott"
"“When you stop dreaming you stop living” - Malcolm Forbes"
"“You can be disappointed if you fail, but you're done if you don't try” - Beverly Sills"
"“Failure is not losing, it is not having tried”: Xavier Gabriel"
"“A champion is afraid of losing. Others are afraid of winning”: Billie Jean King
"“A person who never made a mistake, never tried something new”: Albert Einstein"
"“The way bosses treat employees is exactly how employees will treat customers” – Sam Walton
"“It's okay to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's also okay to check from time to time that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy” - George Lorimer"
"“If you are not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you launched it too late”: Reid Hoffman"
"“The comfort zone is a wonderful place, but nothing grows there”: Anonymous"
"“You will become as small as the desire that controls you, and as large as your dominant aspiration.” - James Allen"

"“Mickey Mouse appeared out of my mind in a sketchbook, on a train from Manhattan to Hollywood, at a time when my brother Roy and I's company was at an all time low and disaster seemed just around the corner. corner”: Walt Disney"
"“I'm not afraid of dying, I'm afraid of not trying”: Jay Z"
"“You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will control you” – Dave Ramsey

"“It doesn't matter how many people you offend, as long as your message reaches your consumers. I say to those who do not want to offend anyone: You are going to have a very, very difficult time trying to get meaningful publicity”: Phil Knight"
"“There is a powerful engine within every human being that, once unleashed, can make any vision, dream, or wish come true” – Anthony Robbins"
"“No tomorrow. Not the following week. But today. The true entrepreneur acts instead of dreaming” – Nolan Bushnell"
"“Self-confidence is the first secret of success” - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"“Remembering that I will be dead soon is the most important tool I have found to help me make the big decisions in life.”: Anonymous

"“Remembering that one is going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking there is something to lose. You are already defenseless. There is no reason not to follow the advice of the heart” - Steve Jobs
"“You must do things that are really important, but you must also have fun, because otherwise you will not succeed”: Larry Page"
"“I will tell you the secret to getting rich on Wall Street. Be greedy when others are fearful and be fearful when others are greedy” – Warren Buffett
"“When I was young, I thought that money was the most important thing in life. Now that I'm older, I know it is.” - Oscar Wilde"
"“All your dreams can come true if you have the courage to pursue them.” - Walt Disney"
"“Happiness is not the mere possession of money; lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort”: Franklin D. Roosevelt"
"“Entrepreneurship is neither science nor art, it is a practice”: Peter Drucker"
"“The grass is greener where you water it” - Neil Barringham"
"“Think big and don't listen to those who tell you that you can't do it. Life is too short to think small” – Tim Ferris
"“Constant growth is the best survival mechanism”: Amancio Ortega
"“You will never be a loser until you stop trying” - Mike Ditka"
"“Great ideas originate in the muscles”: Thomas Edison"

"“Building a great mission and a business go hand in hand. It is true that the first thing that excites me about what we are doing is the mission, but I also think, from the beginning, that we have had a healthy understanding that we have to do both ”: Mark Zuckerberg"
"“Time is money”: Benjamin Franklin"
"“If you only work for money, you will never get it, but if you love what you do and always put the customer first, success will be yours”: Ray Kroc"
"“The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards he sets for himself”: Ray Kroc
"“Risk comes from not knowing what you are doing” – Warren Buffett
"“If you are looking for different results, do not always do the same” - Albert Einstein"
"“The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step”: Lao-tzu"
"“The only limit to our achievements tomorrow is our doubts today”: Franklin D. Roosevelt"
"“If you want to change the world, change yourself” - Mahatma Gandhi"
"“Only those who dare to have great failures end up achieving great successes”: Robert F. Kennedy
"“If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to a person or object” - Albert Einstein"
"“Please think about your legacy, because you are writing it every day”: Gary Vaynerchuck"
"“Take your dreams seriously”: Lao-tzu
"“The main objective of a company is to make money. The primary function of government is to take a large part of that money and give it to others ”: Larry Ellison"
"“It's not how much money you make, but how much money you save, how much money works for you and how many generations you'll have” - Robert Kiyosaki"
"“Do it with passion, or don't do it”: Rosa Nouchette Carey"
"“The real measure of your wealth is how much you are worth if you lose all your money”: Anonymous
"“Anyone who has done anything important in life was disciplined”: Andrew Hendrixson"
"“Life is what happens while we're busy making plans.” - John Lennon"
"“We have to have a goal, a purpose in our lives. If you don't know where you're aiming, you don't have a goal”: Mary Kay Ash"
"“Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work for it”: Anonymous"
"“The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world... are the ones who change it”: Steve Jobs"
"“The tragedy in life is not achieving your goals. The tragedy in life is not having goals to achieve”: Benjamin E. Mays
"“Wealth flows from energy and ideas”: William Feather"
"“The greatest failure is never to have tried”: Chinese proverb"
"“An investment in knowledge pays the best interest” - Benjamin Franklin
"“Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative”: Zig Ziglar
"“If you're going to think anyway, think big”: Donald Trump"
"“An intelligent person should have money in his head, not in his heart”: Jonathan Swift"
"“In moments of crisis, only imagination is more important than knowledge”: Robert Kiyosaki"
"“It is not what you have, but how you use what you have that makes the difference”: Zig Ziglar"
"“Be a benchmark of quality. Some people are not used to an environment where excellence is accepted” - Steve Jobs
"“Almost everything you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it” – Mahatma Gandhi"
"“Never consider study as an obligation, but as an opportunity to penetrate the beautiful and wonderful world of knowledge”: Albert Einstein"
"“Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.” - Steve Jobs"
"“A good idea is 10%% implementation and work, the other 90%% is luck”: Guy Kawasaki"
"“It's okay to celebrate success, but it's more important to heed the lessons of failure.” - Bill Gates"

"“My goal was never just to create a company. A lot of people misunderstand that, as if I don't care about profit or profit or any of those things. But not being just another company means for me to build something that really generates a great change ”: Mark Zuckerberg"
"“It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you don't stop” - Confucius"
"“Success is not achieved only with special qualities. It is above all a work of perseverance, method and organization”: Víctor Hugo"
"“Don't be ashamed of your failures, learn from them and start over” - Richard Branson"
"“There is only one boss. The client. And he can fire anyone in the company, from the president to the last employee, simply by spending his money elsewhere” – Sam Walton"
"“If we were motivated by money, we would have sold Google and we would be on the beach”: Larry Page"
"“Dream big. Start small. But above all, it begins”: Simon Sinek"

"“I have lost more than nine thousand opportunities in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. I've been trusted 26 times with the winning shot and I've missed. I have failed over and over again in my life and that is why I have succeeded” – Michael Jordan
"“Do not be afraid to give up the good, to pursue the great”: John D. Rockefeller"
"“If you are afraid of failing, you will surely fail”: Kobe Bryant"
"“Remember, today is the tomorrow you were worrying about yesterday” – Dale Carnegie"
"“Thinking is the hardest work there is. Perhaps that is the reason why there are so few people who practice it ”: Henry Ford"
"“Why settle for dragging our feet when we yearn to fly?”: Helen Keller
"“No pessimist has ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an undiscovered land, or opened new hope in the human heart”: Helen Keller"
"“You can have anything in this world you want, if you want it enough to pay its price.” - Mary Kay Ash"
"“Many people do not take care of their money until they almost spend it, and others do the same with their time.” - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe"
"“Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing you will be successful”: Albert Schweitzer
"“You can't live the same year 75 times and then call it life”: Robin Sharma
"“You have to know what is going to happen if you want to stay one step ahead”: Phil Knight
"“Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind allows you. You can get what you believe in, remember that” – Mary Kay Ash"

"“Experience has taught me a few things. One is to listen to my intuition, no matter how things sound on paper. The second is that you are usually better at doing what you know. And the third is that your best investment may be the one you don't make ”: Donald Trump"
"“What makes you grow is the defeat, the mistake”: Pep Guardiola"
"“Until you value yourself you will not value your time. And until you value your time you will not do anything with it”: M.Scott Peck
"“There is nothing wrong with being small. You can do great things with a team like that” – Jason Fried
"“I don't have any great ideas. Sometimes I have little ideas that seem to work” – Matt Mullenweg

"“Every time you define what you want to believe, you are the first to hear it. It is a message to yourself and others about what you think is possible. Don't put a ceiling on yourself”: Oprah Winfrey"
"“Fail often so you can succeed soon” – Tom Kelley
"“My favorite things in life don't cost money. It is clear that the most precious resource we have is time” - Steve Jobs
"“Feeling anger is like taking poison and waiting for the other person to die”: Anonymous
"“Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference”: Barack Obama"
"“It is better to fail by being original than to succeed by imitating” - Herman Melville
"“My ambition has always been to make dreams come true”: Bill Gates
"“The man who does more than he is paid will soon earn more than he does” - Napoleon Hill"
"“If you can dream it, you can achieve it”: Zig Ziglar"
"“Champions keep playing until they get it right”: Billie Jean King"
"“For anything to happen, something must first be done” - Albert Einstein"
"“I can't give you a surefire formula for success, but I can give you a surefire formula for failure: Try to please everyone, all the time.” - Herbert Bayard Swope"
"“Rich is not he who has wealth, but he who enjoys it” - Benjamin Franklin"
"“It is possible to win more friends in two months by taking an interest in others than in two years by trying to make others take an interest in us” - Dale Carnegie
"“Instead of thinking about when your next vacation will be, you should build a life that you don't want to escape from.” - Seth Godin"
"“When there is a crisis, it is when some are interested in leaving and we are interested in entering”: Carlos Slim"
"“If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to get used to the ordinary”: Jim Rohn"
"“Wealth is the ability to fully experience life” – Henry David Thoreau
"“Stop waiting for it to be Friday, for it to be summer, or for someone to love you for life. Happiness is achieved when you stop waiting and make the most of the present”: T. Harv Eker"
"“I always tried to turn every disaster into an opportunity”: John D. Rockefeller Jr."
"“Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You have to turn on first”: Fred Shero
"“A successful man is one who can build firm foundations with the bricks thrown at him by others”: David Brinkley

"“There are two types of people who will tell you that you can't make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid that you will be the one who succeeds” - Ray Goforth"
"“If you want something to be done, appoint someone in charge. If you want something to take forever, appoint a commission”: Napoleon"
"“I almost didn't start Google because I was worried about risk and about leaving my Ph.D. program”: Larry Page
"“Creativity is intelligence having fun” - Albert Einstein
"“If money is your hope for independence, you will never have it. The only real security a man will have in this world is a store of knowledge, experience, and skill.” - Henry Ford"
"“There are people who have money and there are people who are rich”: Coco Chanel"
"“There are two types of companies: those that work to try to charge more, and those that work to charge less. We will be of the second class ”: Jeff Bezos"

"“You are responsible for the thoughts that you harbor in your mind at any given time. You have the ability to think what you want. So even all of your negative and self-destructive attitudes and behaviors have originated in the way you have chosen to think.” – Wayne Dyer
"“Change is not only necessary in life, it is life itself”: Alvin Toffler"
"“Anything you want, you can get if you go for it” – Wayne Dyer"
"“A leader is a negotiator of hopes”: Napoleon
"“Don't sleep to rest, sleep to dream. Because dreams are meant to come true”: Walt Disney"
"“The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now”: Chinese Proverb
"“A business is simply an idea to improve other people's lives”: Richard Branson"
"“It is not the employer who pays the salary. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages” – Henry Ford
"“Stay away from those people who try to belittle your ambitions. Little people always do it, but the truly great make you feel like you can be great too.” – Mark Twain"
"“Be the change you want to see in the world” – Mahatma Gandhi
"“If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talent. Value what you know and start getting paid for it”: Kim Garst"
"“In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative and original thinker unless you also sell what you create” – David Ogilvy"
"“I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends”: Abraham Lincoln"
"“The circulation of trust is better than the circulation of money”: James Madison"
"“I have been blessed to find people smarter than me; they help me execute the vision that I have”: Russell Simmons
"“It wasn't raining when Noah built his ark”: Howard Ruff"

"“You can only fully realize yourself in something you love. That your goal is not to make money. Instead, pursue things you love to do and do them so well that people can't take their eyes off you.” - Maya Angelou"
"“In battles you realize that plans are useless, but making plans is essential”: Dwight E. Eisenhower"
"“No man will be the best if he does not have fire in his blood”: Enzo Ferrari
"“One of the biggest mistakes people make is trying to force their interest. You don't choose your passions; your passions choose you” – Jeff Bezos
"“No, I am not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same”: Gabriel García Márquez"
"“If you live to have it all, what you have is never enough”: Vicki Robin"
"“If you don't dream, you won't achieve anything”: Richard Branson"
"“It's easy to be principled when you're rich. The most important thing is to have principles when you are poor”: Ray Kroc
"“If you're in business, you need to understand the environment. You need to have a vision of the future and you need to know the past”: Carlos Slim"
"“Demand a lot of yourself and expect little from others, so you will save yourself trouble”: Confucius"
"“Anyone who is not making mistakes is not trying hard enough”: Wess Roberts"
"“Don't apologize for having high standards. People who really want to be in your life will reach this level”: Ziad K. Abdelnour
"“It is difficult to defeat a person who never gives up”: Babe Ruth
"“You know you're on the road to success if you're willing to do your job even if you don't get paid.” - Oprah Winfrey"
"“80%% of success is simply based on insisting” - Woody Allen"
"“The value of life can be measured by the times your soul has been very agitated”: Soichiro Honda
"“It is not enough to make good products. You have to make people aware of what you are doing”: Phil Knight
"“Money is usually attracted, not chased”: Jim Rohn"
"“Only he who gets up and looks for the circumstances and creates them if he does not find them, succeeds in the world”: George Bernard Shaw"
"“The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all” – Richard Branson"
"“I only work with the best, it's not about the best resumes but about the right attitude”: Donald Trump"
"“High expectations are the key to everything”: Sam Walton"
"“When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the plane takes off against the wind”: Henry Ford"
"“He who has a lot is not rich, but he who gives a lot”: Erich Fromm"
"“There are no secrets to success. This is achieved by preparing, working hard, and learning from failure” – Colin Powell"
"“If the plan doesn't work, change it, but never change your goal”: Anonymous"
"“The impossible is the ghost of the timid and the refuge of the cowardly”: Napoleon"
"“Ideas are easy, implementing them is difficult”: Guy Kawasaki"
"“Pay attention to negative feedback and ask for it, particularly from friends. Hardly anyone does that and it's very helpful ”: Elon Musk"
"“Failure defeats losers and inspires winners” – Robert Kiyosaki

"“The media wants overnight successes. ignore them. It also ignores investors who want proven tactics and instant, predictable results. Listen instead to your customers, to your own vision and do something that lasts a long time”: Seth Godin"
"“An entrepreneur sees opportunities where others only see problems”: Michael Gerber
"“It is necessary to anticipate a certain degree of failure”: Jeff Bezos
"“Life is not fair, get used to it”: Bill Gates"
"“Money is something I vaguely understand and think about it only when I don't have it to finance my projects”: Walt Disney
"“There are many hands and hearts that contribute to the success of a person”: Henry Ford
"“Respect the rules of the game, but be fierce”: Phil Knight"
"“The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary”: Vidal Sassoon
"“The way to start is to stop talking and start doing” - Walt Disney"
"“The path to success and the path to failure are very similar. Only the end differentiates them ”: Colin Davis
"“The secret of happiness is not always doing what you want, but always wanting what you do” - Tolstoy"
"“The worst pollution problem we face today is negativity.” - Mary Kay Ash"
"“There is no path to happiness. Happiness is the way” – Thich Nhat Hanh
"“Imagination is the beginning of creation. We imagine what we want, we create a deep desire for what we imagine, and finally, we create what we have desired” - George Bernard Shaw"
"“If you move confidently in the direction of your dreams and desires to lead the life you have imagined, you will meet with unexpected success”: Henry David Thoreau"
"“We do not dare many things because they are difficult, but they are difficult because we do not dare to do them”: Lucio Anneo Seneca"
"“Anything that can do or dream, begin it. Boldness contains in itself genius, power, and magic” – Goethe"
"“Every time you borrow money, you are stealing money from your future”: Nathan W. Morris"
"“Success usually comes to those too busy to seek it.” - Henry David Thoreau"
"“I have never considered myself an engineer or inventor, I only consider myself a promoter and agitator of ideas”: Enzo Ferrari"
"“The successful warrior is a common man, with a focus similar to that of a laser”: Bruce Lee"
"“The price of success is hard work and the determination that, no matter if you won or lost, you gave your best to the project”: Vince Lombardi"
"“It's not about ideas. But about making these come true”: Scott Belsky
"“The funny thing about the game of life is that when we refuse to settle for second place and decide to go after the best of the best, we usually get it” – Somerset Maugham"
"“The secret to hiring the best is this: look for people who want to change the world”: Marc Benioff
"“Your unhappiest customers are your greatest source of learning” - Bill Gates"
"“Pleasure at work leads to the perfection of the work”: Aristotle
"“Many of our dreams seem impossible at first, then they may seem improbable, and then, when we make a firm commitment, they become inevitable” – Christopher Reeve"
"“If you don't know what to do with your life, do something to save lives. The world is full of people in need, be part of their life and fill that need”: Sanjeev Saxena"

"“Grow up with discipline. Balance your intuition rigorously. Innovate around the core. Don't accept the status quo. Find new ways of seeing. Never wait for the silver bullet. Get your hands dirty. Listen with empathy and communicate with transparency”: Howard Schultz

"This Privacy Policy describes how we manage and protect your personal data and the choices available to you. Additional information about our personal data practices may be provided in product settings, contractual terms, or notices provided before or at the time of data collection.
This Privacy Policy is intended for you if you are a user of our products and services.
1. Personal data collected
Personal Data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (“Personal Data”).
We may collect data or ask you to provide certain data when you visit our websites and use our products and services. The sources through which we collect Personal Data include:
Data collected directly through you or your device relating to an identified or identifiable individual ("Data Subject"), may include direct identifiers such as name, postal and email address, telephone number, and online or indirect identifiers such as account login, login password, marketing preferences, social media account or IP address; If we link other data to your Personal Data, we will treat the linked data as Personal Data; The Application may collect personal information in order to provide a pleasant user experience. Such as:
2. Use of the information collected How May We Collect Personal Information? We may collect the following personal information about you:
Personal information that you provide to us when you download the Application, post material or request additional services; and Personal Information you provide to us when you report a problem with the Application or otherwise communicate with us.
Other Information We May Collect “Other Information” is any information we collect in connection with your use of the Application and Services that does not identify you as an individual, as noted below.
* Device Information: We may collect information about a Device or any computer you use to download or transmit a copy of the Application to your Device, including, where available, unique device or computer identifiers, operating system, type browser and mobile network information. as well as the phone number of the Device. We may use this information to ensure that the Services and the Application function properly and for the business purposes detailed below. * Log Information: We may automatically collect and store certain information about your use of the Application and any Services in server logs, including, but not limited to, Internet protocol addresses, Internet service provider, clickstream data , browser type and language, visited and exit pages, and date or time stamps. We may use this information to ensure that the Services and the Application function properly and for the business purposes detailed below. * Unique Application Numbers: When you install or uninstall an Application or a Service that contains a unique application number or when the Application or Service checks for automatic updates, that number and information about your installation, for example, the type of operating system , they can be sent. for us. We may use this information to ensure that the Services and the Application function properly and for the business purposes detailed below.
3. Exceptions when disclosing your personal information We may disclose your personal information and other information to third parties: – in the event that we sell or buy any business or assets, in which case we may disclose your Personal Information to the prospective seller or buyer of such business or assets; – if all or part of our business, assets or shares are acquired by a third party (including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings), in which case personal information will be one of the transferred assets. – if we are under a duty to disclose or share your personal information in order to comply with any legal or regulatory obligation or request; – to protect our rights, property, privacy, or safety or that of our customers, you, or others. This may include exchanging information with other companies and organizations to fraud protection and credit risk reduction purposes. – to enforce the terms of this Privacy Policy or the Terms of Use; – to allow us to pursue available remedies or limit the damages we may suffer; I – where you have given us your consent to do so.
4. Access To Your Information Under applicable law, you may have the right to access the personal information we hold. To the extent permitted by applicable law, we may charge you a reasonable fee to cover our costs in providing you with details of your Personal Information, subject to limits imposed by applicable law. If you wish to review, correct, update, suppress, delete or limit our use of your Personal Data previously provided for your use, please contact us in accordance with the Contact Us” section below, making clear your name and contact details. and the nature of your request. We will attempt to comply with any request as soon as reasonably possible or unless we need to retain your information for legitimate business or legal purposes."
5. How do we use your information? We use your Personal Data for the following purposes and for the following reasons:
To perform our contract with you or enter into a contract with you at your request, in order to:
* Process the purchase of our products or services through us, our partners or the online stores of our trusted third-party service providers; * Allow the download, activation and operation of the product or service; * Keeping our products or services up-to-date, secure, and error-free, including the implementation of new product features and versions; * Verify your identity and entitlement to paid products or services, when you contact us for support or access our services; * Process your purchase transactions; * Inform you about the status of your orders and licenses; and * Provide you with technical and customer support.
6. Use Of Services By Minors The Application and the Services are intended for use by persons over the age of 13. For the avoidance of doubt, the Application and the Services are not directed to and should not be used by minors. In the United States, this means persons under the age of thirteen (13). In other jurisdictions different age restrictions may apply
7. Privacy Policy Updates We may make changes to this Privacy Policy. Any changes we may make to our privacy policy in the future will be posted on this page and, where appropriate, notified to you by any reasonable means, including through the Application. Please take a look at the “LAST UPDATED” legend at the top of this page to see when this Privacy Policy was last revised. New terms may appear on the screen and you may be required to read and agree to them in order to continue using the Application and any Services. Any changes to this Privacy Policy will be effective when we post the revised Privacy Policy on the Application. Your use of the Application after these changes means that you accept the revised Privacy Policy.”
8. Links to Third Parties
This website may contain links to other sites or documents that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our page, we no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or the protection of your data on those other third party sites. These sites are subject to their own privacy policies, so it is recommended that you consult them to confirm that you agree with them."
